attributes.action: Appoint Jose Mourinho as the Next England Manager
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
England fans are fed up of an inadequate FA who do not know enough about football to appoint a manager that will take the England football team forward.  This has to stop. They will not get Jose as the appointment process is useless.  We have to appoint a manager that is strong and is tatically sound and Jose is the man to do it.
A successful football team raises spirits and can bring the nation together to feel as one.  The England football team is vital in the role it plays in society as so many people care about it.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
